title: New Holland Mhdrescher | Combine Harvester | Free to use 4K footage - creative commons

tasks.task: Drive a tractor while operating pneumatic tire planters
subtasks: Enter and adjust seat for comfort and safety
Engage tractor transmission and begin moving forward
Position tractor over the intended planting row
Monitor speed to ensure proper planting depth and spacing
Oversee pneumatic tire planters to ensure effective seed delivery
Adjust planter settings as needed based on soil and seed conditions
Insert seed into the ground at the correct depth
Ensure seeds are spaced appropriately for optimal growth
Monitor seed flow and replace parts if necessary
Clean and maintain pneumatic tires between plantings
Inspect tractor and planter for any mechanical issues
Check tire pressure and adjust as needed
Verify seed bed preparation is suitable for planting
Adjust seed planting depth as necessary based on moisture and soil conditions
Attach cultivator implements to the tractor
Adjust settings for optimal soil disturbance
Operate cultivator while driving tractor across fields
Monitor equipment performance and make adjustments as needed
Position the combine harvester in the field
Operate combine to harvest crops while driving through fields
Oversee the separation of grain from chaff and stalks
Transfer crops from the combine to storage area
Load fertilizer into spreader
Calibrate spreader for correct application rate
Operate spreader while driving through fields
Assess calibration and make necessary corrections
Choose appropriate cover crop seed
Prepare seed bed for planting cover crops
Plant cover crops using similar techniques as main crop
Monitor cover crop growth and manage as needed

tasks.task: Load grain into grain truck or bin
subtasks: Ensure grain is properly cooled and dried before loading
Operate grain auger or conveyor belt to load grain
Secure grain load for transport or storage
Clean and organize equipment after loading
Grade harvested grain based on quality
Weigh harvested grain to track yield
Record harvest data for future reference
Clean equipment and store for off-season
